import React from 'react' import Like from './common/like'; const MoviesTable = props => { const { movies, onDelete, onLike, onSort } = props; return ( {movies.map((ele, i) => ( ))}
onSort('Title')}>Title onSort('Genre.nam')}>Genre onSort('Stock.q')}>Stock onSort('Rate1')}>Rate onSort('like.lll')}>like onSort('edit.11')}>edit
{ele.title} {ele.genre.name} {ele.numberInStock} {ele.dailyRentalRate} onLike(i)} liked={ele.love} />
) } export default MoviesTable
